{{Wired embedded system |brand=Snom |model=360 |revision= |asin=B000FIHMS0 |est_release_date=05/2006 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |type=VoIP phone |fcc_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=PSB 21553;PSB 21553 E, V1.4, INCA-IP-S; |cpu1_cspeed=150 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-90G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=CMOS 8-bit Microcontroller;Atmel;AT89LS51;;1; |flags= |default_ip= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Business IP Phone with Speaker and Tilt Graphic Display}} :[http://www.snom.com/snom360_voip_phone.html Product page] Linux-based VoIP phone
*[https://www.voip-info.org/wiki/view/snom+360 ''Snom 360'' on '''voip-info''' wiki] :CPU: [[Infineon]] INCA-IP (@150MHz MIPS R4K), 16MB RAM, 4MB Flash :Full-duplex speakerphone, Tilt-adjustable, backlit 128x64 LCD :47 Keys, 12 LEDs for BLF and 1 LED for MWI/SMS :Dual 10/100 Ethernet ports, supports 802.3af PoE :End of sale by SNOM in May 2010, end of support announced for 2012
*[[Lantiq]] PSB 21553 E V1.4 • [https://ark.intel.com/products/series/92494/Intel-INCA-Products Intel INCA IP Chipset] • [http://www.icpdf.com/icpdf_datasheet_4_datasheet/PSB21553E_pdf_1440225/#view Datasheet] :Infineon VoIP engine with Embedded MIPS processor :3 port Ethernet switch and Acoustic Echo Cancellation
*Documentation on [http://wiki.snom.com/Snom360/Documentation Snom wiki].
